Articles.Content: ![bOhY7Qz.png](http://i.imgur.com/bOhY7Qz.png)

You forgot to install a goo capsule.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-28T12:38:01Z" title="08/28/2015 12:38  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 28, 2015</time> by wossname**
  
tpyo
Your rapier is blowing through the entire craft, but not damaging it?
Your craft is facing the wrong way on the runway!
Nothing is wrong. You are using a tractor beam to get Jeb back into the cockpit.
Engine is backwards?
Tha Fart is strong in this one . . .
nah, that's just the built-in seat warmer
Awesome windscreen de-mister!
Groundcontrol be like: "Snoop Dog, please leave the cockpit right now..."

I think it's the engine being backwards (relative to the rest of the craft). However, what's on the nose? Maybe we can find another issue.

Oh yeah, and the rest of it is truly backwards.
But, *does it fly?*
Not enough struts

> 
> Your rapier is blowing through the entire craft, but not damaging it?

Didn't notice it but yes, I'm using version 1.0.3.

Do you see a use for that ? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-26T22:33:02Z" title="06/26/2015 10:33  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 26, 2015</time> by Triop**
Rapier is backwards.
no antenna ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> no antenna ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

So I can't hear "Darude-sandstorm"...![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Your thrust is being occluded by your fuselage.

Did anyone guess right yet?
The smoke is that of an SRB.
That's an oddly-shaped engine bell, what mod is that?
There's nothing concerning about this vessel.

I thought there was a warning sign about not showering in the Rapier engine exhaust... Oh wait maybe it was a different type of engine - never mind it's OK.

JR
Silly! You've put the fuselage, cockpit, fins and wings on backwards!

> 
> Not enough struts

and needs MOAR boosters

Oh...... it looks like the Big-S winglets are missing it's control surfaces. I know that a smaller winglet is directly behind it, but at the outside edge you cannot see a single trace of control surfaces.
